DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Assess Respiratory Syncytial Virus ( RSV ) Respiratory Events Among Premature Infants
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective determine burden RSV disease outpatient setting among 32 35 wGA infant USA receive RSV prophylaxis , measure rate RSV-associated outpatient low respiratory tract illness ( LRI ) infant ' first RSV season .
DOC.criteria: Premature birth ( 32 week 0 day 35 week 6 day GA ) Age 6 month less time screening , born May 2009 January 2010 Season 1 , May 2010 February 2011 Season 2 Written inform consent locally require authorization ( eg , HIPAA ) , obtain subject 's parent/or guardian prior perform protocolrelated procedure .
